summary: my first attempt to put new weapon in game
descriptionHtml:
this mod is not a replacer so it will add 3 new axes that are unique, not craftable.
you can find those axes in a chest near the forge in witerun.

meshes are quite huge from about 5000 tr to if i\'m not wrong about 30000tr
texture are 1024 for 2 axes and the slayer axe is 2048

this is my first attemp so all costructive critics are welcome!

v 2.0

Axes are now craftable under the daedric items but you\'ll need only the steel smithing perk.
Axes can be tempered at the weel and texture is a bit more darker but not that much
(i dont know why my _m.dds(material) is almost black and the .dds(main texture) is more darker than it appear in game!) boh :(
author: PSlayer
